title: Dã Hài Tử (Đứa Trẻ Hoang - 野孩子)
lyrics: Zau syun zi taam jat coeng gam cing Ceoi ngoi dou si jat si heoi wing Bat dang jyu zoi mat jyut tou fong jau waan gwo Zau ho zi jap zi ceot sin ging Cing jyun wok dak nei dik zyun ging Sing sau taai gou ngou dik zeoi ming Zai dak zeon nei bei waan jyu cing waai zim laang Mei syun gu fu jaa ling ding Ming zi oi ze zung naam haai zi Jaa heoi zi nang jyu ci Daan ngo wui sing wai nei zeoi hin gwaa dik jat go neoi zi Ciu ciu mou mou joeng nei caai soeng jyu ho seon fuk ngo Joek gwo can sau pou zyu waak ze bat bit jyu ci Heoi do pong jan syut ngo bat taai ming liu naam haai zi Bat sau ming ling zau si jat zung zeoi waai ming zi Siu ngo ze go hou mou baan faat gun cuk dik je haai zi Lin mut jau hang fuk dou bat gaai ji    Joek ngo ji jin gin ci zung sing Naan dou nei jau sik hap on ding Zan ho sik syut jiu man ngo dik waan mei man Zi gei zau mung zung sou sing Lei coeng si fau jau dim sat ging Waan si gang gwang lit dik kek cing Bit seoi jau ze git gwo coi nang waai nim ngo Joeng ngo jyu fong je ci cing Ming zi oi ze zung naam haai zi Jaa heoi zi nang jyu ci Daan ngo wui sing wai nei zeoi hin gwaa dik jat go neoi zi Ciu ciu mou mou joeng nei caai soeng jyu ho seon fuk ngo Joek gwo can sau pou zyu waak ze bat bit jyu ci Heoi do pong jan syut ngo bat taai ming liu naam haai zi Bat sau ming ling zau si jat zung zeoi waai ming zi Siu ngo ze go hou mou baan faat gun cuk dik je haai zi Lin mut jau hang fuk dou bat gaai ji   Ming zi oi ze zung naam haai zi Jaa heoi zi nang jyu ci Daan ngo wui sing wai nei zeoi hin gwaa dik jat go neoi zi Ciu ciu mou mou joeng nei caai soeng jyu ho seon fuk ngo Joek gwo can sau pou zyu waak ze bat bit jyu ci Heoi do pong jan syut ngo bat taai ming liu naam haai zi Bat sau ming ling zau si jat zung zeoi waai ming zi Ngo jyu siu ngoi jyun ngoi sin go tin zan dik je haai zi Lin mut jau hang fuk dou bat gaai ji
